import numpy as np

X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor

from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor

warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data

test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Target variable

X_train = train.drop('SalePrice', axis=1)
X_test = test.drop('Id', axis=1)  # Remove Id before processing

categorical_cols = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()

# Fill numerical with median

X_test[numerical_cols] = X_test[numerical_cols].fillna(X_test[numerical_cols].median(numeric_only=True))

# Fill categorical with mode
X_train[categorical_cols] = X_train[categorical_cols].fillna(X_train[categorical_cols].mode().iloc[0])
X_test[categorical_cols] = X_test[categorical_cols].fillna(X_test[categorical_cols].mode().iloc[0])

# Feature engineering

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Target variable
y_train = train['SalePrice']
X_train = train.drop('SalePrice', axis=1).copy()

# Prepare test data

X_test_id = test['Id'].copy()

numerical_cols = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()
categorical_cols = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()

# Fill numerical with median
X_train[numerical_cols] = X_train[numerical_cols].fillna(X_train[numerical_cols].median(numeric_only=True))
X_test[numerical_cols] = X_test[numerical_cols].fillna(X_test[numerical_cols].median(numeric_only=True))

# Fill categorical with mode
X_train[categorical_cols] = X_train[categorical_cols].fillna(X_train[categorical_cols].mode().iloc[0])
X_test[categorical_cols] = X_test[categorical_cols].fillna(X_test[categorical_cols].mode().iloc[0])

# Feature engineering
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_test['Age'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearBuilt']
X_test['RemodAge'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearRemodAdd']

X_train['TotalSF'] = X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + X_train['GrLivArea']
X_train['BsmtSF_ratio'] = X_train['TotalBsmtSF'] / (X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + X_train['GrLivArea'] + 1)
